name: All Along the Watchtowers
tooltip:
All Along the WatchtowersLevel 56

Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.

Once all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

Requirements:
- Tower One marked
- Tower Two marked
- Tower Three marked
- Tower Four marked
